summary: This module provides neural‑network components for graph‑based matrix completion. It defines graph convolution layers that aggregate rating‑specific neighbor information and project it into user/item embeddings, as well as bilinear decoders that convert paired node embeddings into class probability scores using basis‑matrix factorization, dropout, and optional activation functions.
business_intent: Supply reusable building blocks for constructing recommendation or link‑prediction systems that rely on graph convolutional matrix completion, helping teams accelerate development of collaborative‑filtering solutions with DGL and PyTorch.
